round_best: Develop an adaptive EEG model using federated learning, where EEG data from multiple clinical sites are used to train a generalized model while maintaining data privacy. Instead of relying on fixed datasets, each new patient’s data contributes to ongoing model training, enabling the model to adjust to individual variances in real time. This approach would enhance the model’s ability to generalize across diverse populations, improving diagnostic accuracy and personalized treatment strategies in clinical environments.
